name: SandBird
description:
WARNING : SOUND CAN BE LOUD, GAME IN ZQSD KEYBOARD.

Made as a Student Project, demo of an upcoming 2D Platformer, deadline : 1 week.

Credits :
Font : 1001 Fonts - The Brownies.
QA : Thibault Pannier, Appirial, sassyCorbeau, Joseph Pelloquet, Elisa Binz, Pixelboum, Samuel Arsac.
SFX : 3rd Note Inc - 3rd Note SFX Pack_Vol.1 Wonder FX.
OST : WhelpSounds - 8bitTrx.
Character Controller : Brackeys.

By Chloé Kubacki - Kiluns @Kiluuuns
